metadata.title: CVE-2022-2873 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel Intelâ€™siSMT SMBus host controller driver in the way a user triggers theI2C_SMBUS_BLOCK_DATA (with the ioctl I2C_SMBUS) with malicious input data.This flaw allows a local user to crash the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
